items.title: Set Australian Timezone
items.desc: Set the timezone in Australia your transactions appear in.

items.title: Update email address
items.desc: Update and confirm your email address with Up.

items.title: Update phone number
items.desc: Update and confirm your phone number with Up.

items.title: Update postal address
items.desc: Update your postal address

items.title: Update profile picture
items.desc: Set and change your profile pic

items.title: Close your Up account
items.desc: Close your Up account 😢

items.title: Apple Pay
items.desc: Use your iPhone or Apple Watch to make purchases.

items.title: Apple Pay - Instant Provisioning
items.desc: Set up Apple Pay before your card arrives.

items.title: Google Pay
items.desc: Use your Android device to make purchases.

items.title: Google Pay - Instant Provisioning
items.desc: Set up Google Pay before your card arrives.

items.title: Fitbit Pay
items.desc: Use your supported Fitbit device to make purchases.

items.title: Garmin Pay
items.desc: Use your supported Garmin device to make purchases.

items.title: Samsung Pay
items.desc: Use your supported Samsung device to make purchases.

items.title: Block Card
items.desc: Activate or Deactivate your card from the Up app.

items.title: Card Controls
items.desc: Fine-grained control over how your Up card can be used.

items.title: Report card lost/stolen
items.desc: Ability to use the app to report your card as lost or stolen and have a new card issued.

items.title: Virtual Cards
items.desc: Create single-use or per-merchant card numbers.

items.title: In-app Card Details
items.desc: View your card number, expiry and CVV from the Up app.

items.title: Transactional
items.desc: A transaction account with no monthly fees and a attached debit card.

items.title: Additional Accounts
items.desc: Ability to create addition transactional accounts.

items.title: Joint Accounts
items.desc: Ability to create an account shared by two people.

items.title: Shared Accounts
items.desc: Ability to create an account shared by two or more people.

items.title: High-Interest Saver
items.desc: Savings account with no monthly fees and competitive rate.

items.title: Shared Savers
items.desc: Ability to create a Saver shared by two or more people.

items.title: Round-ups
items.desc: Round up purchases to the nearest dollar and save the change.

items.title: Round-up Options
items.desc: Configure round-ups to round up larger amounts as well as whole-dollar purchases.

items.title: Linked Account Round-ups
items.desc: Round up to external accounts like your mortgage or credit card.

items.title: Deposit & Withdrawals
items.desc: Deposit and withdraw money from a Saver.

items.title: Transfer Between Savers
items.desc: Transfer money directly between Savers.

items.title: Automated Transfers
items.desc: Set up an automated savings plan for each Saver.

items.title: Pay Anyone
items.desc: Make payments to other bank accounts via standard bank transfer (sometimes called direct entry).

items.title: Osko Payments
items.desc: Make payments via the new, near real-time Osko payments network.

items.title: Scheduled Payments
items.desc: Schedule a date in the future for a payment to be sent.

items.title: Recurring Payments
items.desc: Set up payments that repeat at a given frequency

items.title: Pay Phone Contacts
items.desc: Create payments to contacts from your phone's address book

items.title: Contacts on Up
items.desc: Use your phone's address book to find friends on Up or be notified when they join.

items.title: Register PayIDs
items.desc: Register your email and phone number as PayIDs on Up.

items.title: Generated PayID
items.desc: A PayID provided on sign-up that can be used to fund your Up account.

items.title: Register Up Handle
items.desc: Your Up "username" that makes it easy to get paid by other Upsiders.

items.title: Request Money
items.desc: Request money simply and easily from other Upsiders.

items.title: Split Bills
items.desc: Split bills easily from a receipt with other Upsiders.

items.title: Linked Accounts
items.desc: Identify your external accounts in Up.

items.title: BPay
items.desc: Support for paying bills with BPay.

items.title: Up on Up Payments
items.desc: Enhanced, instant payments to other Upsiders.

items.title: Identify Pay/Salary
items.desc: Identify your incoming Pay/Salary.

items.title: Auto Transfer of Pay/Salary
items.desc: Automatically transfer a percentage of your pay to Savers when you get paid.

items.title: Search Activity
items.desc: Lightning-fast in-app search of your transactions and activity.

items.title: Smart Receipts
items.desc: Ability to see enhanced data on receipts. Note: big area that we've only just started.

items.title: Smart Receipts: Afterpay
items.desc: Ability to see enhanced data from Afterpay on receipts, including future payments

items.title: Merchant ID
items.desc: Merchant ID system to map your transaction descriptions to real merchants.

items.title: Crowdsourced Identification
items.desc: Customers can help identify merchants and those suggestions can be propagated to all customers.

items.title: Transaction Categoriser
items.desc: Taxonomy of categories than can be applied to transactions.

items.title: Tag Transactions
items.desc: Ability for customers to tag transactions with their own categories.

items.title: Add txn notes & attachments
items.desc: Ability for customers to add notes or attached photos/files to transactions.

items.title: Monthly Insights
items.desc: A monthly report on spending and saving insights.

items.title: Compare Months
items.desc: Ability to easily compare spending and saving between months.

items.title: Location Insights
items.desc: Reports on key locations of spending. Still much more to do on this.

items.title: Budgeting
items.desc: Ability to set spending limits on specific categories or across the board.

items.title: Spendable Balance
items.desc: A balance figure that takes into account the money you have, spending committments and your pay cycle.

items.title: Regulars
items.desc: Basic detection of regular recurring charges.

items.title: Manually Add Regulars
items.desc: Ability to manually add regular charges to Upcoming.

items.title: Edit/Delete Regulars
items.desc: Ability to manually edit and delete Regulars.

items.title: Upcoming Payments
items.desc: Ability to see upcoming scheduled payments.

items.title: Scheduled Transfers
items.desc: Ability to see scheduled savings contributions.

items.title: Talk to Us
items.desc: Begin an in-app conversation to get help, suggest ideas or file bugs.

items.title: Attach Screenshot
items.desc: Attach a photo or screenshot to a conversation.

items.title: Attach Video
items.desc: Attach a video to a conversation.

items.title: Attach Transaction
items.desc: Attach a transaction receipt to a conversation.

items.title: Dispute Transaction
items.desc: Dispute a card payment end-to-end from within the Up app.

items.title: Surveys & Updates
items.desc: Support for other kinds of conversations including surveys and updates.

items.title: iPhone App
items.desc: Up iPhone application.

items.title: Android App
items.desc: Up Android application.

items.title: Apple Watch App
items.desc: Up Apple Watch app.

items.title: Apple Tablet App
items.desc: Support for using Up with a native iPad app.

items.title: Up Web Interface
items.desc: Support for accessing Up through a web browser.

items.title: File Exports
items.desc: Support for exporting transaction data in a variety of formats.

items.title: OAuth API (read only)
items.desc: Initial support for an open read-only API using OAuth to authenticate.

items.title: Open Banking Support
items.desc: Support for the Australian Open Banking standards (once they arrive).

items.title: OAuth API (write)
items.desc: Support for full control of your Up account via an API.

items.title: Real-time Webhooks
items.desc: Support for ability to have Up notify your application in real-time of events.
